attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about our orange Cheeto president but it took 10 years to download. When it finally downloaded I proceeded to opened it only for it to glitch out and set my phone on fire. I downloaded it on another phone but it only took me to a link that showed me a video of our president bathing and bleaching his skin in a pool of orange cheese Cheetos. I was so scared and traumatized after watching the video I decided to call the cops but they told me if his skin wasn’t black they couldn’t do anything about it😭 so I just decided to delete the app. The next day random Cheeto bags started showing up in my house and I don’t know what to do with them because I only eat hot Cheetos. Please don’t download this app my house is now infested with Cheeto bags and I don’t know what to do.
attributes.title: I am scared😰
